materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Tsoont Kol or Apple Tree Canal in Kashmir. The photograph features a large canal in the middle. On the left, in the forefront, there is a small boatwith a man. On the right of the photograph in the background, there is a building by the bank, with another small boat in front of it. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Tsoont Kol, Apple Tree Canal, Kashmir
